name: InSpirit (InSpirit_IndieDev)
description:
HELP  IMANI AND ZULIE CROSS A MYTIC SWAMP!

Imani is a voodoo pristess who was performing a ritual in an unfortunate time and got stuck with Zulie, a spirit that now cohabitates in her body. To free them from each other they must adventure through a misterious swamp and cooperate in using their unique abilities, only one condicion stands in their way.

To switch control over to Zulie and give use to her powers a ritual must be performed.

And this ritual requires a sacrifice.

Features:
  • Voodoo themed
  • Coordinate two characters
  • Death is the main mechanic
Team Credits:
  • Diana Amaral (Game Designer)
  • Joana Marques (Game Artist)
  • Tomás Longo (Game Developer)
